1: וַתֵּצֵ֤א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> דִינָה֙ <sup>1783 </sup> <n>And Dinah</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughter</n> לֵאָ֔ה <sup>3812 </sup> <n>of Leah</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> יָלְדָ֖ה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>which she bare</n> לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>unto Jacob</n> לִרְא֖וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>to see</n> בִּבְנ֥וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughters</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n>

21: הָאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> הָאֵ֜לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> שְֽׁלֵמִ֧ים <sup>8003 </sup> <n>[are] peaceable</n> הֵ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אִתָּ֗נוּ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> וְיֵשְׁב֤וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>us therefore let them dwell</n> בָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> וְיִסְחֲר֣וּ <sup>5503 </sup> <n>and trade</n> אֹתָ֔הּ <sup>853 </sup> וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>therein for the land</n> הִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> רַֽחֲבַת־ <sup>7342 </sup> <n>behold [it is] large</n> יָדַ֖יִם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>enough</n> לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>for them</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֹתָם֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>their daughters</n> נִקַּֽח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>let us take</n> לָ֣נוּ לְנָשִׁ֔ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>to us for wives</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>them our daughters</n> נִתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and let us give</n> לָהֶֽם׃
22: אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Only</n> בְּ֠זֹאת <sup>2063 </sup> <n>Only herein</n> יֵאֹ֨תוּ <sup>225 </sup> <n>consent</n> לָ֤נוּ הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>will the men</n> לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>unto us for to dwell</n> אִתָּ֔נוּ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> לִהְי֖וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>to become</n> לְעַ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> אֶחָ֑ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>with us to be one</n> בְּהִמּ֥וֹל <sup>4135 </sup> <n>among us be circumcised</n> לָ֙נוּ֙ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> זָכָ֔ר <sup>2145 </sup> <n>if every male</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> הֵ֥ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>as they</n> נִמֹּלִֽים׃ <sup>4135 </sup> <n>as they [are] circumcised</n>
23: מִקְנֵהֶ֤ם <sup>4735 </sup> <n>[Shall] not their cattle</n> וְקִנְיָנָם֙ <sup>7075 </sup> <n>and their substance</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> בְּהֶמְתָּ֔ם <sup>929 </sup> <n>and every beast</n> הֲל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> לָ֖נוּ הֵ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אַ֚ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Only</n> נֵא֣וֹתָה <sup>225 </sup> <n>of theirs [be] ours? only let us consent</n> לָהֶ֔ם וְיֵשְׁב֖וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>unto them and they will dwell</n> אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>
24: וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hearkened</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> חֲמוֹר֙ <sup>2544 </sup> <n>And unto Hamor</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> שְׁכֶ֣ם <sup>7927 </sup> <n>and unto Shechem</n> בְּנ֔וֹ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>his son</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> יֹצְאֵ֖י <sup>3318 </sup> <n>all that went out</n> שַׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>of the gate</n> עִיר֑וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of his city</n> וַיִּמֹּ֙לוּ֙ <sup>4135 </sup> <n>was circumcised</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> זָכָ֔ר <sup>2145 </sup> <n>and every male</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יֹצְאֵ֖י <sup>3318 </sup> <n>all that went out</n> שַׁ֥עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>of the gate</n> עִירֽוֹ׃ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of his city</n>
25: וַיְהִי֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בַיּ֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <sup>7992 </sup> <n>And it came to pass on the third</n> בִּֽהְיוֹתָ֣ם <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כֹּֽאֲבִ֗ים <sup>3510 </sup> <n>when they were sore</n> וַיִּקְח֣וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> שְׁנֵֽי־ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>that two</n> בְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> יַ֠עֲקֹב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> שִׁמְע֨וֹן <sup>8095 </sup> <n>Simeon</n> וְלֵוִ֜י <sup>3878 </sup> <n>and Levi</n> אֲחֵ֤י <sup>251 </sup> <n>brethren</n> דִינָה֙ <sup>1783 </sup> <n>Dinah's</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>each man</n> חַרְבּ֔וֹ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>his sword</n> וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הָעִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>upon the city</n> בֶּ֑טַח <sup>983 </sup> <n>boldly</n> וַיַּֽהַרְג֖וּ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>and slew</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> זָכָֽר׃ <sup>2145 </sup> <n>all the males</n>
26: וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֲמוֹר֙ <sup>2544 </sup> <n>Hamor</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁכֶ֣ם <sup>7927 </sup> <n>and Shechem</n> בְּנ֔וֹ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>his son</n> הָרְג֖וּ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>And they slew</n> לְפִי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with the edge</n> חָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>of the sword</n> וַיִּקְח֧וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דִּינָ֛ה <sup>1783 </sup> <n>Dinah</n> מִבֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> שְׁכֶ֖ם <sup>7927 </sup> <n>of Shechem's</n> וַיֵּצֵֽאוּ׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and went out</n>
27: בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>The sons</n> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> בָּ֚אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הַ֣חֲלָלִ֔ים <sup>2491 </sup> <n>upon the slain</n> וַיָּבֹ֖זּוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>and spoiled</n> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the city</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>because</n> טִמְּא֖וּ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>because they had defiled</n> אֲחוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>269 </sup> <n>their sister</n>
28: אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צֹאנָ֥ם <sup>6629 </sup> <n>their sheep</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּקָרָ֖ם <sup>1241 </sup> <n>and their oxen</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֲמֹרֵיהֶּ֑ם <sup>2543 </sup> <n>and their asses</n> וְאֵ֧ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בָּעִ֛יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and that which [was] in the city</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>and that which [was] in the field</n> לָקָֽחוּ׃ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>They took</n>
29: וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֵילָ֤ם <sup>2428 </sup> <n>And all their wealth</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> טַפָּם֙ <sup>2945 </sup> <n>and all their little ones</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <sup>802 </sup> <n>and their wives</n> שָׁב֖וּ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>took they captive</n> וַיָּבֹ֑זּוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>and spoiled</n> וְאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that was</n> בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>even all that [was] in the house</n>
30: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יַעֲקֹ֜ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> שִׁמְע֣וֹן <sup>8095 </sup> <n>to Simeon</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and</n> לֵוִי֮ <sup>3878 </sup> <n>and Levi</n> עֲכַרְתֶּ֣ם <sup>5916 </sup> <n>Ye have troubled</n> אֹתִי֒ <sup>853 </sup> לְהַבְאִישֵׁ֙נִי֙ <sup>887 </sup> <n>me to make me to stink</n> בְּיֹשֵׁ֣ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>among the inhabitants</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <sup>3669 </sup> <n>among the Canaanites</n> וּבַפְּרִזִּ֑י <sup>6522 </sup> <n>and the Perizzites</n> וַאֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> מְתֵ֣י <sup>4962 </sup> <n>and I [being] few</n> מִסְפָּ֔ר <sup>4557 </sup> <n>in number</n> וְנֶאֶסְפ֤וּ <sup>622 </sup> <n>they shall gather themselves together</n> עָלַי֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וְהִכּ֔וּנִי <sup>5221 </sup> <n>against me and slay me</n> וְנִשְׁמַדְתִּ֖י <sup>8045 </sup> <n>and I shall be destroyed</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>and</n> וּבֵיתִֽי׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>I and my house</n>
31: וַיֹּאמְר֑וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> הַכְזוֹנָ֕ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>as with an harlot</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Should he deal</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲחוֹתֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>269 </sup> <n>with our sister</n> פ
